attributes.action: Murders and rapist to serve more than 30 years to life in prison.
attributes.additional_details: To make make and restore Great Britain values and standards.
attributes.background: To send a very strong message to the community (and other potential criminals).This will ensure that no killer's, sex offenders and other dangerous criminals are released from prison until they are unlikely to be in a position to reoffend.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Reform the UK Justice System, review sentencing for violent crimes
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332758
